Pakistan's victory solidifies their status as the most successful team in the tournament's history.

title: Cockroaches can worsen indoor air quality and harm your breathing
description: Cockroaches are more than just a nuisance; they significantly degrade indoor air quality by releasing allergens and bacterial toxins, primarily through their droppings. New research reveals these microscopic particles linger in dust and become airborne, exacerbating respiratory issues for allergy and asthma sufferers. Effective pest control dramatically reduces these harmful substances, proving that eliminating cockroaches directly improves your home's air.

It also gives your brain a boost, sharpening memory and focus, and helping prevent cognitive decline

title: Paul Tagliabue death: How former NFL commissioner died at 84
description: Former NFL Commissioner Paul Tagliabue, who led the league from 1989 to 2006, passed away at 84 due to heart failure linked to Parkinson's disease. During his tenure, Tagliabue oversaw significant growth, including league expansion, stadium development, and global reach, transforming the NFL into a global powerhouse. He is remembered for his strong leadership and dedication to the sport.

title: Arunachal class 10 student dies by ‘suicide’ in hostel washroom

The family declined a post-mortem, opting for traditional rites.

description: The Gates Foundation has pledged $2.5 billion over five years to advance global women's health, marking a significant increase in their investment. This funding will primarily support research and development for innovations like self-injectable contraceptives and rapid STI diagnostics, aiming to address long-overlooked health disparities and catalyze broader action.

title: Tom Brady reacts as Fox Sports swaps Mark Sanchez for Drew Brees
description: Tom Brady reacts to Drew Brees replacing Mark Sanchez at FOX Sports as the network cuts ties with Sanchez amid his felony case. Brady’s accuracy comment, Brees’ career stats and statements, and FOX’s broadcast shakeup headline a major shift. Full details on Brees’ new role, Sanchez’s exit and what Brady’s reaction means for FOX Sports.

title: Klay Thompson apologizes to Megan Thee Stallion after airport pickup mishap
description: Dallas Mavericks star Klay Thompson went viral for his heartfelt apology and remorse after arriving late to pick up girlfriend Megan Thee Stallion from the airport. He presented her with flowers, expressing genuine regret, which fans found "adorably human." The couple's authentic connection continues to charm audiences as they both thrive in their careers.

title: Joe Alwyn’s clover photo sparks Swiftie claims of quiet nod to Taylor Swift
description: Swifties believe Joe Alwyn’s Instagram photo featuring a heart-shaped dish with a four-leaf clover was a subtle show of support for Taylor Swift’s $360 million masters buyback deal. Fans linked the clover to Shamrock Capital, interpreting the image as a quiet nod to Swift’s victory, even though Alwyn never addressed it publicly.

title: 'Success takes time': Nvidia CEO tells Zuckerberg- here's what he said
description: Nvidia's Jensen Huang and Meta's Mark Zuckerberg shared insights on AI's future and building tech empires. Huang humorously wished he'd dropped out like Zuckerberg, while both acknowledged their long journeys and mutual admiration. Nvidia's remarkable rise to a $5 trillion valuation was highlighted, contrasting with Zuckerberg's own dorm-room beginnings leading to Meta's trillion-dollar status.
